document.description: An automated machine takes your order and payment. ... Re: Robot Replaces Workers At Fast Food Restaurant ... know why machines can't make burgers, they make cars ...

10-19-2011, 04:47 PM # 1 dtp947 Member Join Date: Feb 2007 Posts: 187 Robot Replaces Workers At Fast Food Restaurant Even jobs at fast food restaurants are in danger as companies try to displace workers to add more profit like at this Jack In The Box. An automated machine takes your order and payment.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDJc1NoGg2g
dtp947 View Public Profile Send a private message to dtp947 Find More Posts by dtp947
10-20-2011, 04:02 PM # 2 glenfalls Member Join Date: Apr 2005 Location: Las Vegas Posts: 7,299 Re: Robot Replaces Workers At Fast Food Restaurant I don't know why machines can't make burgers, they make cars and just about anything you can think of. __________________ The one thing money can't buy is poverty.
